instructions: put the dinner plate on the table toward the bottom middle
put the fork head up to the left of the plate
put the salad fork head up to the left of the dinner fork
put the dinner knife to the right of the plate
put the salad knife to the left of the dinner knife
put the soup spoon to the right of the salad knife
put the water glass to the upper right of the dinner plate
put the wine glass to the right of the water glass
put the wine glass to the right of the wine glass
put the coffee cup to the right of the soup spoon
put the bread plate above the dinner fork
put the bread knife on the bread plate at the upper right corner, pointing upper left
put the dessert fork horizontally above the dinner plate, with the prongs to the right
put the dessert spoon horizontally above the dessert fork, with the head to the left
put the napkin vertically on the plate
